payload.name: diagnostic
payload.core: Infer hidden faults or root causes from observed symptoms using fault/causal models combined with uncertainty handling and systematic elimination.
out: ranked list of probable causes with confidence levels
next-best diagnostic tests to discriminate hypotheses
proc: gather symptoms: collect observable anomalies and context
generate hypotheses: enumerate plausible causes from fault model
prioritize by prior probability and severity
design discriminating tests: identify observations that differentiate hypotheses
update beliefs: revise probabilities based on test results
iterate until confident diagnosis or escalate with uncertainty bounds
check: each hypothesis has explicit supporting and refuting evidence
test selection justified by discriminative power
escalation criteria defined if diagnosis uncertain

diff.abductive-13: structured fault-model-driven vs general best-explanation inference
diff.mechanistic-40: uses mechanism knowledge vs explains mechanism itself
diff.value-of-information-52: VoI prioritizes tests, diagnostic consumes that guidance
diff.counterfactual-39: identifies actual cause vs explores hypothetical changes

fail.signal: locking onto first plausible cause; ignoring disconfirming evidence; skipping differential
mitigations: list at least 3 hypotheses before investigating deeply
explicitly note evidence against the leading hypothesis
ask 'what else could cause these symptoms?'
require one discriminating test before declaring root cause

ex.symptoms: P99 latency 5x normal; errors stable; CPU normal; memory normal
ex.tests: check DB slow query log; trace sample requests; review dependency dashboards
ex.result: DB slow query log shows 3s queries on user table; index missing after migration
ex.diagnosis: missing index causing full table scans; ruled out network (traces show DB wait), GC (no pause spikes)
